spatial_accuracy.notes: Major layout deviations from the 2D plan. (E1/E2) Foyer area at bottom-right of plan is not represented as a distinct space; entry appears to open directly into living. (E1/E2) Utility (3'9" wide) on far right connected to kitchen is missing as a separate room. (E1/E2) Balcony at bottom-left is not correctly formed/positioned; 3D shows a recessed exterior pocket near entry but not the plan’s balcony relationship to living. (E2/E3) Several interior door locations/orientations do not match: plan has a defined entry→foyer→living sequence and separate living→kitchen and living→toilet doors; 3D door placements are simplified/shifted. (E2) Toilet location is not as clearly top-center/right as in plan; appears more central, affecting circulation. (E4) Room proportions appear altered: kitchen zone reads larger/open compared to plan; living/foyer proportioning differs due to missing foyer.

structural_fidelity.notes: Structural fidelity is poor due to missing/merged spaces. (E1) Utility room missing. (E1) Foyer missing as a bounded room. (E1/E2) Balcony not faithfully modeled as a distinct exterior room off living. (E2) Adjacencies are altered: in plan foyer buffers entrance from living and sits adjacent to kitchen; in 3D this adjacency/circulation is not preserved. (E2) Door embedding/partitioning around toilet/kitchen appears simplified (fewer defined wall returns and openings). Wall thickness looks somewhat consistent but does not compensate for missing partitions.

furniture_mapping.notes: Furniture only partially matches. (E2/E4) Living/dining in plan shows dining table + sofa layout; 3D uses a different arrangement/scale (central chaise-like seating) and lacks clear dining placement. (E1) Bedroom wardrobe/storage shown in plan is not modeled. (E4) Some furniture scale reads oversized relative to room extents (especially seating in living).

aesthetic_quality.notes: Visually clean and readable with good lighting and generally clean geometry. Camera is isometric-like but uses noticeable perspective (not true orthographic). Minimal rendering artifacts; materials are simple but coherent.

detected_errors.description: Foyer (4'6"x3'10") is missing as a distinct enclosed space; entry appears to open directly into living.
Utility area (3'9" wide) connected to kitchen on the far right is missing as a separate room/zone.
Bedroom wardrobe/storage element shown on the 2D plan is not represented in the 3D render.
Balcony is not accurately placed/formed relative to the living room; 3D shows an exterior recess near the entrance rather than the plan’s balcony off living at bottom-left.
Toilet placement is shifted (reads more central) compared to the plan’s top-center/right positioning, changing circulation.
Door sequence/orientation does not match plan: plan indicates entry→foyer→living plus distinct living→kitchen and living→toilet doors; 3D simplifies/relocates openings.
Window placement differs: 3D includes a prominent living/front window not clearly indicated on the 2D plan, and kitchen/utility-side openings do not match the plan intent.
Proportions are distorted due to missing foyer/utility partitions; kitchen and living extents read different from the 2D dimensional balance.
